Detailed Description

Basic random number generation utility functions.

Member Function Documentation

static plFloat plRandom::normal_float ( plFloat  m,
plFloat  sd 
)
inlinestatic

Draw a floating number random value normally distributed widh m as mean and sd as standard deviation.

It uses the Box-Muller algorithm and is based on the MT1937 uniform random generator.

References plNormalRandom().

static plFloat plRandom::normal_float ( plFloat  m,
plFloat  sd,
plFloat  a,
plFloat  b 
)
inlinestatic

Draw a floating number random value normally distributed widh m as mean and sd as standard deviation in the range [a,b[.

It uses the Box-Muller algorithm and is based on the MT1937 uniform random generator.

References plNormalRandom().

Draw uniformly a floating number random value in the range [0,max[.

It uses the MT1937 random generator.

inlinestatic

Draw uniformly an integer random value in the range [0,max-1].

It uses the MT1937 random generator.
